headline: How "expensive" is crypto anyway?
keywords: Crypto, Speed & Reliability, Security, SSL, TLS, RSA
description: I wouldnâ€™t be surprised if the title of this post attracts some Bitcoin aficionados, but if you are such, I want to disappoint you. For me crypto means cryptography, not cybermoney, and the price we pay for it is measured in CPU cycles, not USD.
